::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

:::


The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: T5.1.web.mix v1.0.


> Major and minor occurrences were initially identified using consensus land-cover maps (Tuanmu et al. 2014) and then cropped to selected terrestrial ecoregions (Dinerstein et al. 2017) at 30 arc seconds spatial resolution. Ecoregions were selected if: i) their descriptions mentioned features consistent with those identified in the profile of the Ecosystem Functional Group; and ii) if their location was consistent with the ecological drivers described in the profile..

::: {.cell}

:::


You can download and use this file from the following sources:

- Zenodo repository (bundle of maps) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG versions in compressed file](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419))
 - Mapbox tileset ([GeoTIFF version uploaded to Mapbox](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T5_1_web_mix))
 - Zenodo repository (EFG map) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG files](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091003))

::: {.cell}

:::

This section provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**T5.1 Semi-desert steppe**](/efg-info/T5_1.qmd).


::: {.cell}

:::

## Available maps

These maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group.

- Web navigation (**code: T5.1.web.mix**, version v1.0) 
 - Indicative Map (**code: T5.1.IM.mix**, version v1.0) 

## Map files

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

T5.1.web.mix (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/T5.1.web.mix_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419) :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091003) :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T5_1_web_mix) :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/)
T5.1.IM.mix (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/T5.1.IM.mix_v1.0.tif) :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934)

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
